Test Name: HIGH MOBILITY GROUP A2 (HMGA2) Immunostain (Technical Component Only)
Purpose: To perform HMGA2 immunostaining on FFPE tissue sections to obtain consistent and accurate staining results for diagnostic interpretation.
Container: FFPE tissue block or pre-cut slide on a positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Microtome, 45–50 °C water bath, humidity chamber, autostainer (optional), light microscope
